planet.name: K2-32 b
Gaia DR2 4130539180358512768 b
planet.description: This planet was discovered by Dai et al. 2016. The discovery was made with a space based telescope (0.95 m Kepler Telescope). The parameters listed here are those reported by Heller et al. 2019 and were imported into the Open Exoplanet Catalogue from the NASA Exoplanet Archive.
